name: UISheetPresentationController.Detent
desc: An object that represents a height where a sheet naturally rests.

items.name: class func large() -> Self
items.desc: Creates a system detent for a sheet at full height.

items.name: class func medium() -> Self
items.desc: Creates a system detent for a sheet that's approximately half the height of the screen, and is inactive in compact height.

items.name: struct UISheetPresentationController.Detent.Identifier
items.desc: Constants that identify system detent sizes.
